author: mhagger
msg: Handle Skip conditions by throwing exception.
pred.cond within the try...except and if it is true, just raise a
Skip exception.  This is then handled the same way as a Skip thrown

author: mhagger
msg: no need to raise an SVNTestStatusCodeError exception on one line and
catch it on the next one.  Just do the error-handling inline.

author: mhagger
msg: Corrected "how to use module" comment in svntest/main.py.
